title: Pessat 2024
content: Was there negative marking in pessat 2024 ? Was it mentioned in the instructions?

comments.body: it is 0.25 negative this time. its same as jee since 25% marks are deducted in every wrong ans
Thanks. Also, was it mentioned in the instructions? Since my friend was unaware or maybe skipped it.
It was mentioned in their website and given on the instructions screen as well
ohhh link? i checked and didnt found anything regarding marking scheme
are there questions from the deleted syllabus of jee?
Can I get CSE-AIML with 3600 rank in PESSAT at ec campus? And, should I join counselling in either first round or second round?
Can I get ece in ec campus at 6067 rank? Atleast in the second round considering there was negative marking this year
